title: How to get your story out there if you don't know how to write - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends how badly you want to get it out there. You could employ a Ghost Writer. I’ve never ghost written personally, but I believe it works like this: you sit with the writer and tell them your story verbally, or I guess you could record it. Then they write the book for you. You’ll often find celebrities do this, with the main credit going to them (to sell the book) and a much smaller credit to the writer - E.G. “with xxx xxx” . I have no clue how much this would cost.

Stop telling yourself you don’t know how. You’ve been writing all your life. We all have. You may not be sure about writing a story, poem, or a book, but all that can be learned. Just sit down and do it. Write about anything — it doesn’t matter what. There are plenty of writing prompts online. Use them.
